name: puppeteer-lambda-starter-kit
description: Starter Kit for running Headless-Chrome by Puppeteer on AWS Lambda

scripts.package: npm run package-prepare && cp chrome/headless_shell.tar.gz dist && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-nochrome: npm run package-prepare && cd dist && zip -rq ../package.zip .
scripts.package-prepare: npm run babel && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD=1 npm install --production
scripts.babel: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.local: npm run babel && cp -r node_modules dist && node dist/starter-kit/local.js
scripts.test: rm -rf test-dist && mkdir test-dist && babel test --out-dir test-dist && cp -r node_modules test-dist && node test-dist/index.js
